website_summaries.verdict: This classic design and large size makes this a great decoration for the home or office.
pros: Large, 60-minute hourglass that makes an excellent accent piece
It has a gorgeous classic design and is well-constructed
Stands 9.5 inches tall and has a 6-inch base
cons: May come unassembled, and the time is off by a couple minutes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Traditional Hourglass
customer_reviews.text: I like hourglasses and this one almost resembles the one shown at the start of Days of Our Lives. Almost. I like starting it right before watching Days of Our Lives.
customer_reviews.author: B. J.

customer_reviews.title: and it is really nice. I accidentally broke the glass part while putting ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office, and it is really nice. I accidentally broke the glass part while putting it together, and emailed Lily's. To my surprise they not only answered right away, but are sending a replacement. That’s what I call great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl

customer_reviews.title: Plan for it to possibly arrive damaged`
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damage because the parts were not properly assembled. Now I have to return my wife gift and start all over because they couldn't assemble their product correctly without damage. I was happy when it arrived, but as soon as I took it out I could see it was broken and not assembled properly. The hour glass case was not secured properly and you can't take it apart to try and fix yourself so it leaves no choice but to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived very quickly
customer_reviews.text: This package came irreparably damaged! Shattered glass and sand everywhere! Still waiting for a reply from “ service@lilyshome.com Just received the item at 10:00 this morning 4/20/2018, so not really concerned about their reply yet, just so disappointed about the hourglass! I was really looking forward to displaying on my dining table!! The wooden frame lookied STUNNING!! The one star was for the frame! Hopefully I can write a 5 star review very quickly!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: antdoy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I was worried after reading a review, but i took a chance anyway. I'm so glad that I did!! It's beautiful, all parts were in tip top shape, and it ran smoothly. It took 62 minutes to run out, which is amazing to me that it was even that close. We live in the digital age, so accuracy is what my phone and clocks are for. This is one lovely decorative piece, and something that I just always wanted. And it keeps time.....well, close enough.
customer_reviews.author: MichL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not functional
customer_reviews.text: This came unassembled and is very challenging to put together. My first one broke but the seller was excellent about replacing. Mine runs a full ten minutes past an hour so it is useless for what I wanted it for. I expected a few minutes off, however ten is a lot more than I was expecting. Looks beautiful but I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but at the price it should come ...
customer_reviews.text: Having read other reviews that stated several issues with putting it together , I still felt it would be worthwhile to make the purchase . As it turned out I should have heeded their comments . There were difficulties with securing the screws into the pillars ( one screw head snapped off ) and the rubber plugs could not be inserted until they were softened by the heat from a hair dryer ( suggested by a Lily's customer service rep ) . After a bit of a struggle and two calls to Lily's , I was able to complete the hourglass . Nice product , but at the price it should come already assembled !
customer_reviews.author: Candy DiPietro

customer_reviews.title: in perfect shape...
customer_reviews.text: have been a Days of Our Lives fan since it went on the air in 1965...ordered the hour glass that resembles the actual hour glass on the show...absolutely beautiful...if I didn't know that it wasn't the actual hour glass I would swear it was..perfect color, perfect condition...so thrilled I finely got one..will treasure this memento...took great care in packaging it also...thank you so much Lily's Home...
customer_reviews.author: Tim Ciotti

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this hourglass. It's very beautiful and of high quality and keeps accurate time within a second or two.
customer_reviews.author: Gregorio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hourglass
customer_reviews.text: This hourglass is of very high quality. It was a perfect gift! And it was packed very securely. Would definitely buy it and from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hourglass!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for an hourglass just like this one for years. I’m thrilled to have found it and it’s beautiful!! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replica hour glass from days of our lives soap opera
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for a dear friend. She has been wanting an hour glass that looked like the one from soap opera "Days of Our Lives". She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R

customer_reviews.title: which makes it next to useless both as a hourglass and as decor
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived missing one of its rubber feet, which makes it next to useless both as a hourglass and as decor. It timed (with the side possessing all three feet down) in at under 58 minutes. I would have expected it to be within 1 minute of an hour, not almost three short.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this hour glass as a gift........very nice gift.......first hour glass came in the mail and was broken......"sand" everywhere.....but they were so nice and sent another one.....in great shape!!! Thank you......love customer service...love the hour glass.
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition and impressively packaged. No assembly required and works like a charm, although it is more like 70 minutes. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: James Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: It comes fully assembled!! 😀
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what all the fuss is about the assembly problems with these. Mine came fully assembled, and this thing is absolutely beautiful. 4 stars only because this hour glass runs a little slow, 66 minutes. Did I mention it is just gorgeous?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT elegant
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT elegant...small and cheaply made. One of the leg posts cracked without even being tightened down completely. This was a Christmas gift, actually ended up going to local department store and purchased a much nicer product for less money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it is a beautiful peace to have around the house
customer_reviews.text: Putting it together is tricky, but it is a beautiful peace to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful three pillar  hourglass .
customer_reviews.text: You done a great job of packing this item . It arrived in great shape good job. I love it .
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband had been wanting a wooden full hour glass. Gave this one to him for Christmas and he absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Braswell

customer_reviews.title: It looks fantastic but it is very frustrating to put the rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks fantastic but it is very frustrating to put the rubber feet on. I have spent plenty of time to do so and have yet to get one of them to fit in the designated hole.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Will be buying more. Wad hard to put rubber pegs in. But worth it great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan L Wood

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my wife as a Christmas gift. It looks great and she loves it. Recommended. Not terribly accurate. The one I received came in at 62.25 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Divit7

customer_reviews.title: More like a 59-Minute Glass!
customer_reviews.text: The Wicked Witch of the West had this technology down in 1939. We should be able to get it right 80 years later.
customer_reviews.author: D. Acuff

customer_reviews.title: We're having an issue getting the rubber stoppers in but we can work on that later - other than that we love this
customer_reviews.text: Stunning piece! My 9 year old daughter wanted an hour glass for Christmas and I wanted something she could have for a lifetime and this was the one! We're having an issue getting the rubber stoppers in but we can work on that later - other than that we love this item
customer_reviews.author: Caesar’s Ma

customer_reviews.title: How to repair
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful sand watch but its very loose fit on the base that is terrible for this watcb
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Nina

customer_reviews.title: we had an hour timer years ago that worked much better but that's true of most everything now days
customer_reviews.text: the last pieces to be put on had to be cut down to size to get them in place. we called the company for help but the solution they gave us didn't work. we had an hour timer years ago that worked much better but that's true of most everything now days.
customer_reviews.author: james rochel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality,  value
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, good quality, looks nice. Used for wedding gift and decoration at wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 it is perfect! my husband asked for an hour glass an ...
customer_reviews.text: arrived right away!!1 it is perfect! my husband asked for an hour glass an HE LOVES IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: christine Book

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful hourglass! And affordable for the size and quality it is.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. Very Rich and Nice Looking. Works Very Well.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is my wife bought me this for Christmas and hid it till Christmas
customer_reviews.author: George Wilson Smith

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend as a time piece
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as it was described. It required assembly (which was not mentioned in the product description), but it functions perfectly. Would recommend as a time piece, if not a beautifully-crafted decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Cucuk

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: the glass came broken it is more expensive for me to send it back for replacement
customer_reviews.author: Reinerio Canales

customer_reviews.title: That being said it looks cool and the kids love messing with it
customer_reviews.text: Be honest. You don’t need an hour glass. It’s 2017. That being said it looks cool and the kids love messing with it. Also great for timing homework time. It’s accurate to about 2 minutes which is cool I guess. If you want an hour glass and like me don’t know why just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to do your own modifications
customer_reviews.text: Rubber feet are absolutely impossible to put on. Several scratches on it. Screws are hard to put in--in fact, I had to drill the holes more so the screws would actually go all the way in. I ended up buying different rubber feet for it because the ones included were far too big. Once put together, it is a nice piece. Never quite on the hour (I think it is somewhere around 64 minutes); but let's be real--who is still using one of these for an actual timer? I use it largely for decor and as a piece to help remind me to focus; I am not billing people based on my Amazon-bought hourglass.
customer_reviews.author: JeepAtty

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, but not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This product looks wonderful, but your mileage may vary with using it as a time-keeping device. Know that you will need to assemble it yourself. Only a Phillips screwdriver is needed. As other reviewers have written and rubber feet can be hard to put in. I just carfule used a slot screw driver to push them in and a rubber mallet on the most stubourn ones. My main issue with the product is that it is not a 60 minute timer, at least not mine. It is closer to 70 minutes. The glass is also sealed, so there is no easy way to adjust the amount of sand.
customer_reviews.author: T. Heibeck

customer_reviews.title: as the screw does not get into the column easily. Also
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to assemble the frame, as the screw does not get into the column easily. Also, the feet is hard to put on. I am so afraid to break the glass when getting the top board and feet on; it seems hammering is inevitable... Broken... how sad.
customer_reviews.author: Izzysylph

customer_reviews.title: Got an hour to burn.
customer_reviews.text: This is a magnificant piece. I have it sitting on my piano and use it as a timer for practice and playing. The cherry wood is beautiful and it is a some wht very large hour glass. I am please with the craftmenship and the detail that went into making this hourglass. Evertime it flip it over I think of the Wizard of OZ. The hourglass has very percisce round feet on both ends and it just looks teriffic on my piano. Get one for yourself if your looking for uility and presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Russell allen

customer_reviews.title: Hour glass
customer_reviews.text: This hour glass is beautiful! I have purchased 2 in past as gifts and decided I needed one for myself! It is well made and exactly what I was looking for! It was in fully functional out of the box. In prior reviews, there were complaints about the rubber feet. The feet were attached and I have no complaints or issues with them. If you are looking for a fun yet elegant gift, this is it. Additionally, the price is very reasonable. I would recommend this hour glass!
customer_reviews.author: cabascom

customer_reviews.title: 72 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Clocked it at 72 minutes. I'll try to take it apart and remove some sand. Other than this the build quality is about right for the price. Recommended. EDIT: The glass is sealed. There is no way to remove/add sand to calibrate it.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This attractive hour glass will look great on your desk, but don't rely on it to let you know when an hour has passed. I've timed it several times and mine lasts for between 1 hour 12 minutes and an hour and 13 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Aberdeendoc

customer_reviews.title: Great hourglass for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great hourglass for a great price. Bought as a gift, the recipient was very happy. It takes a little self assembly to put the legs in etc, very easy. Looks great, really does. Finish is nice, glass is clear and sand is really white. Pretty much exactly 1 hour, as far as we measured (causally). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: OmNomNomNom

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: My dad loved it. Got it for him for Christmas to put on his desk. Easy to put together as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyyabiish

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! I think I missed the part where this has to be assembled. First, some of the wood pieces came scratched. Secondly, the screws were literally rusted and did but fit the screw holes. Finally, I never was able to get the rubber feet in. Just didn't happpen. I may send it back or may try to salvage it myself. Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.author: P R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hourglass, great service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an anniversary gift for my wife. It was delivered quickly. It was packaged very safely with a guarantee that a replacements would be made if anything was broken. It is a beautiful piece, definitely worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Cody Puckett

customer_reviews.title: A Great Piece.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and performs wonderfully. The glass does seem fragile and it takes a small amount of skill to assemble it. It is a nice size and I like that it will "perform" for a full hour after flipping it over.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for Decor, the time is off by 26 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is as pictured. Was a a great addition to decor on a new table
customer_reviews.author: Liny85

customer_reviews.title: Really great product - well designed and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love this high quality product. It's a real hour glass that I love to use for timing my kids ipad and iphone usage. I feel like the Wicked Witch of the East every time I turn if over!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Rice

customer_reviews.title: Basically the Days of Our Lives hourglass
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review kind of late (about a year after purchase) but I can gladly report it has held up and sits on our dining room side table.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Englebrecht

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but broken
customer_reviews.text: I Received my hourglass today and the entire hour glass was shattered even though it was in three boxes and each box wrapped in bubble wrap 😢
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: a good product. Holes for screws are undersized
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a good product. Holes for screws are undersized. One broke off in one of the spindles. It was very difficult to remove. Could be better.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Price

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift and it was well received! The wood is good quality and solid. Excellent purchase. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Phillips

customer_reviews.title: None of the finishing parts fit correctly, and construction ...
customer_reviews.text: None of the finishing parts fit correctly, and construction of the product broke the glass. Tried twice - broke twice. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Lighter than expected. You must assemble it yourself which is annoying for such a small piece, and I could not get the plastic black things to go in so I left them off.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bobst

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing..I wanted an hour glass to reminded of short.. Too short to sit and time the hour glass
customer_reviews.author: Nopohboy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Luv it, just was a bit smaller than expected that's the only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Stanislaus

customer_reviews.title: The recipient seemed to be very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift. The recipient seemed to be very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dancer

customer_reviews.title: caveat emptor
customer_reviews.text: The three wooden pieces began to move very quickly as I tried to make it begin timing. However, I've learned to turn it over very carefully but it shouldn't have done this.
customer_reviews.author: King Cool

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in the photograph, but you have to assemble the product yourself. The components are cheaply made and one of the screws snapped during assembly. This is a delicate product, but not the kind of delicate the price warrants. Buyer beware. I contacted customer service for replacement parts and after an initial quick reply I have not heard back from them in days and they have neglected to give me any shipping information for the replacement products.
customer_reviews.author: Preferred Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what i wanted beautifully made looks just like the hourglass from days of are lives
customer_reviews.author: Peter

product_meta.title: Lily's Home 60-Minute Hourglass Sand Timer with Cherry Finished Wood Base, Stylish Centerpiece for Home or Office Use, Ideal Gift for Executive, Chef or Kitchen Connoisseur (9.5" Tall x 6" Dia. Base)
product_meta.description:
A Timeless Statement Piece For Your Home Or Office. Wherever you place this elegant timer, you’re sure to add a touch of elegance. Gorgeous hand-blown glass sand timer is surrounded by a beautiful cherry wood frame. Pure white sand drifts from the top chamber to the bottom in approximately one hour, the perfect time for your meeting, lunch break or work session. 

Just flip the hourglass and set it down on its base to reset the timer. You’ll find it relaxing to sit and watch the sand flow through the glass. Adds a sense of serenity to a stressful workplace or a hectic home, as a gentle reminder to slow down and enjoy its simple beauty. 

This elegant sand timer makes a beautiful gift for weddings and birthdays, though your recipients will adore it any time of year.
feature_bullets: ELEGANT, FUNCTIONAL DECOR. Wood frame with cherry finish and hand-blow glass adds a polished touch to your home or office.
A STYLISH WAY TO TIME MEETINGS. Use the 60-minute timer to time anything from meetings and lunch breaks at the office, to games and playtime at home.
MAKES A GREAT CENTERPIECE. At 9.5” in height and 6” diameter at the base, this large hourglass is a true conversation starter. Strikingly elegant, it’s both a work of art and a useful tool.
DOUBLE PACKAGED. Arrives carefully packaged to ensure you receive it in perfect condition.
GIVE AS A GIFT. Elegant black wood frame is durable and complements any kitchen. Makes a thoughtful gift for any occasion.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars182 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
